Package prefuse.data.query

Dynamic query bindings and data range models for creating dynamic queries.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DynamicQueryBinding
    Abstract base class for dynamic query bindings, which support data queries that can be dynamically edited with direct manipulation user interface components.
    ListModel
    List data model supporting both data modeling and selection management.
    ListQueryBinding
    DynamicQueryBinding supporting queries based on a list of included data values.
    NumberRangeModel
    Range model for numerical data.
    ObjectRangeModel
    Supports an ordered range of arbitrary objects.
    RangeQueryBinding
    DynamicQueryBinding supporting queries based on a range of included data values.
    SearchQueryBinding
    DynamicQueryBinding supporting text search over data values.

Package prefuse.data.query Description

Dynamic query bindings and data range models for creating dynamic queries. A dynamic query binding takes a particular data column and creates a binding between a filtering predicate over the data and user interface widgets for controlling the parameters of the predicate. This includes queries over a range of data (RangeQueryBinding), selecting between different categories of data (ListQueryBinding), and text search (SearchQueryBinding).
